scripts.build: yarn --cwd ../aws-lambda-graphql run build; yarn --cwd ../aws-lambda-ws-link run build; ncc build src/index.ts -o dist
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation package --template-file cloudformation.yml --s3-bucket brosoft-chat-app --output-template-file dist/template.yml && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/template.yml --stack-name example-chat-server --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
